column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////This is the kind of place where the bartenders put on a show
column2: and not a Tom Cruise in cocktail kind of way
column3: rather its like watching an artist who is so devoted to his craft that he is precise and painstakingly exact about every little detail and the finished product is a potent
column4: yet balanced cocktail.  That rival some of the best in the city (still give my nod to Aviary though
column5: but that is comparing apples and oranges with modern/molecular gastronomy vs. classic).  The one downfall I found was the wine list was a little lacking
column6: but do yourself a favor and trust me on this.  Stick to the cocktails and you can't go wrong.
